value.name: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson: The Treasures of Agra
value.original_name: Приключения Шерлока Холмса и доктора Ватсона: Сокровища Агры
value.overview: The fourth part of the Soviet TV series based on Arthur Conan Doyle's stories about Sherlock Holmes. The film was shot based on the story "The Sign of Four" and the story "A Scandal in Bohemia".
